statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE total_budget >= 50000.00;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, current_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE current_budget < total_budget;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_budget DESC, project_name ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE current_budget < total_budget
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31'
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY project_name
SELECT start_date, end_date, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_budget DESC
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE project_budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE project_budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT project_name, project_budget, start_date FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT * FROM project_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000;
SELECT project_name, project_budget, start_date FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT project_name, project_budget, start_date FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY project_budget DESC;
SELECT project_name, expense_description, expense_amount FROM renewable_energy_projects INNER JOIN project_expenses ON renewable_energy_projects.project_id = project_expenses.project_id;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE total_budget > 10000;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS project_count FROM project_categories JOIN renewable_energy_projects ON project_categories.category_id = renewable_energy_projects.project_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects;
SELECT project_name, total_budget FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE end_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM project_expenses WHERE amount_spent BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM projects
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 10000
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC
SELECT category, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount < 500
SELECT category_name FROM budget_categories
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, end_date, budget FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND budget < 10000;
SELECT project_name, amount FROM projects JOIN expenses ON projects.project_id = expenses.project_id WHERE category = 'Marketing';

SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects JOIN project_expenses ON projects.project_id = project_expenses.project_id JOIN expenses ON project_expenses.expense_id = expenses.expense_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT category_name, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM budget_categories JOIN expenses ON budget_categories.category_name = expenses.category GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE project_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM projects WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT project_name, SUM(amount) AS total_expenses FROM projects p JOIN project_expenses pe ON p.project_id = pe.project_id JOIN expenses e ON pe.expense_id = e.expense_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT p.project_name, c.category_name FROM projects p JOIN project_categories pc ON p.project_id = pc.project_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.project_name, c.category_name;
